text: Romancing the Stone is a 1984 American Mexican romantic adventure comedy movie directed by Robert Zemeckis and starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito, Holland Taylor, Alfonso Arau, Zack Norman, Manuel Ojeda. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1985. It was followed up by The Jewel of the Nile in 1985. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:1984 adventure movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Mexican adventure movies Category:Mexican comedy movies Category:Mexican romance movies Category:Jungle movies Category:Movies set in Colombia Category:Movies set in New York City Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Zemeckis
title: Romancing the Stone
